name: Hamza Nouman
title: High School Student | Aspiring Software Engineer
summary: Motivated student with a passion for AI, backend development, and robotics. Focused on building real-world projects using Python, Flask, and React.

projects.name: Gemini Chatbot

roles for Gemini.description of the role of Gemini: answers questions based on the structured résumé JSON file, providing accurate and relevant information.

What I am looking for.description: Help me in coding and programmming, especially in Python and Flask. I am eager to learn and improve my skills in backend development and AI integration, and make sure that i maybe ask about the technologies like arduino and this things.
